name: VTSAnalyst
0:
”Alexa, ask VTS analyst for my risk report”
”Alexa, ask VTS analyst for my expiring leases”
”Alexa, ask VTS analyst for my longstanding vacancies”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: v. t. s. analyst
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Never be blindsided again. By starting your day with this VTS skill for Alexa, you’ll know exactly what risks you should be worried about in your commercial real estate portfolio. With VTS, you’ll get real-time, actionable insights about areas of potential concern across your portfolio, such as stalled deals, expiring leases, and spaces that have been vacant for a long time. 

Launch the skill by saying, “Alexa, open VTS Analyst” and Alexa will run you through a list of risk areas. 

From there, you can ask Alexa for further details about any of the highlighted risks and immediately understand where you need to act before you even get into the office. No more waiting on manual reports or chasing people for updates. 

These insights are powered by the VTS Network, the most comprehensive and accurate source of portfolio and market data in the commercial real estate industry.

The skill is available to anyone that manages their portfolio on VTS. Clients can learn more about enabling VTS Analyst by contacting their VTS Client Advisor. 

VTS is commercial real estate’s leading leasing, marketing and asset management platform, where deals happen and real-time data come to life. To learn more about VTS, visit www.vts.com or reach out to us at info@vts.com.
